GSP33bbdip12u:793: tato bahvannaṃ bhavatvityālocya sa mṛtyuḥ 'tayā vācā';
GSP33bbdip12u:809: nanvapsaṃvatsasṛṣṭyādinātrocyamānenāpi kathamasya viṣṇuprakaraṇatvaniścaya ityato 'psaṃvatsarasṛṣṭyāderviṣṇuliṅgatvāditi bhāvena tasya talliṅgatve smṛtimāha - nehāsīditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:828: 'tatra'; aṇḍe saṃvatsarākhyaṃ brahmāṇamasṛjadityanvayaḥ nāmetyanena samyagvatsabhūtān ramayatīti vyutpattyā saṃvatsaraśabdaścaturmukhe prasiddha ityucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:840: sṛṣṭaṃ taddharaye 'rpitavāniti śeṣeṇa yojanā brahmavaivarta ityanantaraṃ yata uktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:848: ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33bbdip12u:849: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca trināciketāḥ (kaṭha. 1-3-1.)
GSP33bbdip12u:852: atrādhikaraṇe lokato 'nyatra prasiddhakarmaphalabhoktṛtvaliṅgasya viṣṇau samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:863: sarvāttṛtvamadhye praviṣṭaṃ tadviśeṣabhūtaṃ pātṛtvaṃ yatroktaṃ tatra kāṭhake 'ṛtaṃ pibantau';
GSP33bbdip12u:868_0: iha tu karmabandhavidhure paramātmani prakṛtyarthasya nirbhede pratyayārthasya cāyogānna
GSP33bbdip12u:870: viṣayavākye janyajanakabhāvaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ tathā ca 'sukṛtasya loke';
GSP33bbdip12u:871: sukṛtanirmite puṇyakārye tattvapradīparītyā sukṛtanimitte śarīre hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau guhāyāmapi 'parame';
GSP33bbdip12u:872: sarvajīvottame ā ṛddha ārdhaḥ parebhyo rudrādibhya ārdhaḥ parārdhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:874: tathā ca tatra praviṣṭau hṛdayaguhāśritavāyvadhiṣṭhānāviti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip12u:877: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tathā dharmaḥ sukṛtaṃ cābhidhīyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:878: ṛtaṃ tu mānaso dharmaḥ ....... iti gītābhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛteḥ śāstravihitakarmabhirāgataṃ phalamupalakṣaṇayā ṛtamityucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:883: 'sa eṣa yajñaḥ pañcavidho 'gnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau cāturmāsyāni paśuḥ somaḥ'; ()
GSP33bbdip12u:886: naciketā nāma ṛṣiḥ naciketasa idaṃ nāciketamagnicayanaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:887: trināciketāstrivāramanuṣṭhitanāciketeṣṭakācayanavanto ye vartante viduṣāṃ pāpināṃ ca krameṇa 'chāyātapau';
GSP33bbdip12u:893: iti vākye pibantau yau pratīyete tau kāvityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:894: anena pibantau kiṃ jīvaparau uta pararūpe eveti saṃśayaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:895: itītyanantaraṃ iti saṃśaye jīvasahitar iśvaraḥ pāteti pūrvapakṣe ca satīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:910: tathā ca - yāvātmānau ṛtaṃ pibantau tāvātmānau viṣṇurūpe eva /
GSP33bbdip12u:913: viṣṇū iti vaktavye viṣṇurūpe evetyuktiḥ dvivacanasya rūpadvayavivakṣayā sāvakāśatoktyarthā /
GSP33bbdip12u:919: nanu viṣṇossarvaśarīreṣvekaikarūpeṇaiva praveśātkathaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇāpi dvivacanopapattirityataḥ taddarśanāditi sūtrāṃśasūcitaśrutimudāharati - gharmeti //
GSP33bbdip12u:929: deśataḥ kālataḥ śaktitaśca sampūrṇau yau bhagavantau trivṛtaṃ tejobannātmakaṃ śarīraṃ 'vyāpatuḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:940: gurvarthadīpikāyāṃ tu samantāditi padacchedaṃ kṛtvā vidyamānāviti cādhyāhṛtya samantādvidyamānau vyāptāviti vyākhyātam/
GSP33bbdip12u:946: ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudramāviveśa sa idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ vicaṣṭe /
GSP33bbdip12u:947: taṃ pākena manasāpaśyamantitastaṃ mātā relhi sa u relhi mātaram //
GSP33bbdip12u:948: suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhirekaṃ santaṃ bahudhā kalpayanti / (ṛ. 10-114-4., 5.)
GSP33bbdip12u:965: tathā ca - ekasminnapi viṣṇau yuktaṃ rūpadvayābhiprāyeṇa dvivacanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:966: evaṃ taddarśanāt ityetat tattvapradīparītyā uktaviśeṣaṇe nirṇīte viṣṇau dvivacanadarśanāt 'ekaḥ suparṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:967: ityādinā tacchabdenaikavacanena parāmarśadarśanāt tasyaiva samudraniveśino nikhilabhuvanadarśinaḥ 'apaśyamantitaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:972: niviṣṭo hṛdaye nityaṃ rasaṃ pibati karmajam //
GSP33bbdip12u:975: nanu viṣṇau rūpadvayavivakṣayā pratyayārthopapattāvapi prātipadikārthakarmaphalabhoktṛtvāyogāt na 'ṛtam';
GSP33bbdip12u:977: eka eva hariḥ dehajīvarūpopādhibhedāt ātmāntarātmeti rūpabhedena 'dvidhā sthito';
GSP33bbdip12u:980: yaddhā - ṭīkārītyā upādhibhedavivakṣāmantareṇaiva dvirūpatayā dehaniviṣṭaḥ 'karmajaṃ rasaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:991: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇameva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:996: śubhaṃ pibatyasau nityaṃ nāśubhaṃ sa hariḥ pibet /
GSP33bbdip12u:997: pūrṇānandamayasyāsya ceṣṭā na jñāyate kvacit // iti pādme //
GSP33bbdip12u:1013: pūrṇānandasya sukhabhogāyoga iti dvitīyaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ pariharati - pūrṇānandamayasyeti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1018: aiśvaryaṃ kvacitkāle deśe kenāpi sākalyena 'na jñāyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:1020: tathā ca - aiśvaryabalena pūrṇānandasyāpi sukhabhogo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1038: tathā ca - na śrutiyuktivirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1045: tasya jīve 'pi yogādityata āha - yo vedeti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1051: tathā ca ityādinā viṣṇoreva prasiddhaṃ guhānihitatvamatra grāhyamiti imamarthaṃ sūtrakāro hiśabdena darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1052: tathā ca - hṛdayaguhāsthatvamātrasya jīve sambhave 'pi na tadiha hetutvena gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1061: kutaḥ? hi yasmāttau hṛdayaguhāṃ praviṣṭau tasmāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1062: na hi jīve 'pi guhāniviṣṭatvaliṅgaṃ sambhavatīti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1068: na ca rūpapraveśena dvirūpeṇa praveśasyāsiddhatvādityāśaṅkyāha - taddarśanāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:1071: atra tattvityasyānuvṛtyā śrautapadānuvṛttyā ca ānandamayastadbrahmetyādivadihāpi pratijñāsiddheḥ ātmānāvityuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1073: smṛtisamākhyāṃ śrautapadānuvṛttiṃ vinā ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā śubhakarmaphalabhoktṛtvarūpaliṅgaṃ ca vaktum /
GSP33bbdip12u:1074: uktaṃ hi candrikāyām - ādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattyā ātmaśabdoktaṃ śubhabhoktṛtvaṃ mūlayuktiriti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1077: tathā - yadyapi samanvetavyamṛtapātṛtvaṃ sākṣādeva vaktavyamiti tadvākyāntarasyāpyādeyaṃ mātīti vyutpattimantareṇāntaryāmītivat ṛtaṃ pibantāviti spaṣṭaśabdenaiva vaktavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1081: tathā teṣāmeva samanvayasūtrāttadityatrāpyanuvartate iti candrikāvirodhoktirapi cintyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1083: na ca tadityanuktau tuśabdasyānvayaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate iti samanvayādhikaraṇīyasudhāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1092: evaṃ yadā niravakāśaguhānihitatvaliṅgasya sāvakāśāddvivacanaśrutito 'pi prābalyādviṣṇoḥ prakṛtyarthabhoktṛtvasambhavācca sa eva pāteti siddhyati /
GSP33bbdip12u:1093: kimu punarniravakāśaśrutyāpītyarthaṃ pratipādayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadabhipretaśrutimevodāharati - viśeṣaṇācceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1098: iti śrutau pibatorekavacanabodhyenaikatvena viśeṣaṇādeka eva pātā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1099: sa ca yajamānasetutvabrahmatvākṣaratvādinā viśeṣaṇāt brahmaṇaśca paratvena viśeṣaṇādviṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip12u:1106: taṃ dhyātuṃ naciketasaṃ prati sādhanaṃ vaktuṃ 'śakemahi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1113: amitā hi guṇā yasmānnānyeṣāṃ tamṛte prabhum / iti brāhme /
GSP33bbdip12u:1121: jñātavyāśca sarvairadhikāribhiḥ sarve guṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1123: jñānaṃ bhavet ataḥ sarvaguṇajñānārthaṃ tasmin viṣṇau brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyate iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1124: yato brahmaśabdena sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33bbdip12u:1127: yasmādvibhuṃ taṃ viṣṇumṛte anyeṣāṃ jīvānāṃ nāmitā guṇāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1136: atra paraiḥ pibantau buddhijīvāviti pūrvapakṣe prāpte jīveśvarāveveti vyākhyātaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1140: hetau, svavyānena saha paravyākhyānanirākaraṇasya samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ tathā cāsaṅgatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1143: satya ātmā satyo jīvaḥ satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā
GSP33bbdip12u:1154: kecidbhedamasatyamāhuḥ tatkathametadityatasteṣāṃ pakṣe śrutirabhīkṣṇaṃ dūṣaṇamabhidhatte - maiveti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1156: āsamantādaraśīlā vā āravaḥ tairasatyabhedajñānibhiḥ viṣṇuḥ sarvathā vanyo bhajanīyo netyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1158: asya nāsatyo bheda ityuttareṇānvayaḥ evaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutirityasyāpi /
GSP33bbdip12u:1159: atra yadyapi bhāgavatatātparye - 'satyatvaṃ ca bhedasyoktaṃ bhāllaveyaśrutau /
GSP33bbdip12u:1160: sthāṇurheccakrāma sa prajāpatimuvāca ko 'si ke smaḥ kaḥ saḥ iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1161: sahovāca yo 'smi ye stha yaḥ sa iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1162: athainamupākrośat satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā';
GSP33bbdip12u:1173: tātparyodāhṛtā tu anyā tatsamākhyā rūpā cetyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1185: 'saḥ'; viṣṇuryādṛśo mayā bhavadādibhiśca bhinnastādṛśa eveti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1191: evameva hi me vācaṃ satyāṃ kartumihārhasi //
GSP33bbdip12u:1220: dvitīye tu viṣayānatikrameṇa bhedasatyatvajñānasya trāṇakāraṇatvoktyā bheda satyatvamapi jñāyata iti prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1222: tathāhi - dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:1223: daivo vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu //
GSP33bbdip12u:1230: ta āsurāḥ svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ jagataḥ kṣayakāriṇaḥ //
GSP33bbdip12u:1232: indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ujjataṃ nyarpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1242: triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ tayetvṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti / (ṛ. 10-87-11.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1243: vācā stenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ / (ṛ. 10-87-15.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1244: atha jñānopasargāḥ ityārabhya yecānye mithyātarkairdṛṣṭāntaiḥ kuhakendrajālairvaidikeṣu paristhātumicchanti taiḥ saha na saṃvaset /
GSP33bbdip12u:1246: ityādiśrutiśatairandhaṃ tama eva māyināṃ gatiriti niścīyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1250: sarve yānti tamo ghoraṃ na teṣāṃ utthitiḥ kvacit // iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1262: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyaṃ viṣayasaṃśayau sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ ca darśayati - āditya iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1274: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi sa evāhamasmīti ca vākyadvaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1278: pūrvapakṣe gārhapatyasyaiva akṣisthatvasādhanena gārhapatyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ tasyāsādhanāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1282_0: evaṃ gārhaptayasyāpi ādityasthatvamucyate iti dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ gārhapatyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:1282_2: yuktipradarśanārthaṃ vā tadupādānamiti na vaiyarthyamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1292: prakṛtasya ata ityanena parāmṛṣṭāsyādityāntaḥ sthatvasya aikye hetutvāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1296: tathā ca - yadānandamayākhyaviṣṇuniṣṭhatayoktamādityasthatvaṃ tacchāndogye 'ya eṣa āditye puruṣaḥ so 'hamasmi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1301: tataḥ kim? yato 'tra gārhapatyākhyāgnerevādityasthatvamucyate 'to 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate';
GSP33bbdip12u:1305: tathā ca pūrvapakṣaśrutigatāhaṃśabdo agnāveva mukhya iti tasyaiva grahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1309: yadvā - 'aśanayodāhṛtādityastrivṛdiva vai cakṣuḥ śuklaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kanīnikā'; ()
GSP33bbdip12u:1311: tathā ca - ādityasthatvoktyā arthādakṣisthatvamapi prāptameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1318: ata eva bhāṣye sannyāyaratnāvalyāṃ ca akṣyādityayoraikyādityevoktam,
GSP33bbdip12u:1320: akṣyādityayorekavidhatvāditi ṭīkāpi bhāṣyānusāreṇa prakārabhedaniṣedhamukhena prakāryaikyaparā neyeti pakṣāntaramapyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1323: maṇḍalaparatve tadbhāṣyasthādityapadaṃ pūrvodāhṛtataittirīyaśrutisthādityapadaṃ ca maṇḍalaparatayā vyākhyeyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1332: iti vākyadvārā ekārthatvamupapādya tanmukhena 'ya eṣa āditye';
GSP33bbdip12u:1334: iti vākyasya saṅgatiṃ sampādya taddvārārthākṣiptatadarthārthakasya 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi';
GSP33bbdip12u:1335: iti vākyasyāpi tena saṅgatirityevaṃ vakrasaṅgatyaitadadhikaraṇārambhaḥ ādityasthatvaliṅgasyāpi samanvayasiddhyartham /
GSP33bbdip12u:1340: ityuktākṣisthajñānātpratīyata iti vakṣyamāṇaṛjusaṅgatyaiva adhikaraṇamārambhaṇīyaṃ syāditi dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1343: ataḥ 'tadyathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate'; (chāṃ. 4-14.)
GSP33bbdip12u:1349: tadapi bādhitaṃ syādityata āha - ata iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:1354: tathā ca yato 'gnirakṣistho 'tastajjñānādeva mokṣo 'pi bhavet na viṣṇujñānāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1358: na ca tajjñānātsarvapāpāśleṣamātreṇa kathaṃ mokṣa iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:1359: yatastajjñānānmokṣaṃ vinā sarvapāpāśleṣāsambhavena tadanyathānupapattyaiva mokṣasyāpyupapattiriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:1365: kamalāyanasyāpatyaṃ kāmalāyanaḥ nāmataḥ upakosalaḥ satyakāmākhye gurau brahmacaryamuddiśyovāsa /
GSP33bbdip12u:1368: punaḥ punaḥ svajāyayokto 'pi anuktvaiva vidyāṃ pravāsāya prātiṣṭhata /
GSP33bbdip12u:1369: tadopakosalo vyādhipīḍito vidyāprāpticintayā svācāryabhāryayā aśānetyukto 'pi nāśnāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:1370: evaṃ brahmacāriṇyanaśnati tūṣṇīṃbhūte sati tadā gārhapatyādyagnayaḥ kāruṇyāviṣṭāḥ trayo 'pi vayamasmai brahmacāriṇo vidyāṃ prabravāmeti pratijñāya militāssanto vidyāmūcuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1371: 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'; ityādi /
GSP33bbdip12u:1372_0: evaṃ sambhūyopadeśānantaramenaṃ pratyekam agnaya upadidiśuḥ ityucyate vedapuruṣeṇa
GSP33bbdip12u:1372_1: 'atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa ...... ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi
GSP33bbdip12u:1373: evaṃ tribhiragnibhiḥ pratyekamupadiṣṭa upakosalaḥ athāsmābhiruktaṃ jñeyameva,
GSP33bbdip12u:1378: kimiti? yadagnibhistubhyamupadiṣṭaṃ tattvayā jñeyameva na tūpāsyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:1379: tattvamahamupadekṣye ityevaṃ pratijñāyādarajananāya vakṣyamāṇamastaut 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃkarma na śliṣyata'; iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:1381: kimiti? 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GSP33bbdip12u:1386: asya so 'hamasmītyasya dvikartukatvādgārhapatyādyantaryāmī bhagavān svasyādityādyantaryāmiṇā gārhapatyādiḥ svāntaryāmiṇaḥ ādityādyantaryāmiṇā aikyamāhetyucyate /
GSP33bbdip12u:1388: āditye ca eṣa puruṣaḥ pūrṇaṣaḍguṇo bhagavān dṛśyate divyadṛṣṭyā so 'smītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1391: evamupāsakasya phalamāha - 'sa etadevaṃ vidvānupāste 'pahate pāpakṛtyāṃ lokī bhavati sarvamāyureti jyogjīvatīti'; /
GSP33bbdip12u:1403: vakṣyamāṇākṣisthatvena brahmāparokṣajñānini jñānottaraṃ pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1404: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇyantaḥpuruṣo dṛśyate divyadṛṣṭyā eṣa ātmā vāmanākhya iti hovāca upakosalaṃ prati satyakāmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1422: cakṣurantaḥstha ityanena antara ityaṃśo viṣṇurevetyanena anuvṛttastattvityaṃśaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:1423: yadyapi anuvyākhyāne śabdavaiyarthyaparihārāya antassthitvā ramaṇakṛditi vyākhyānāt atrāpi tadanusāreṇa ramaṇakṛcceti vaktavyam /

GSP33bbdip12u:2186: aṅkurādijanane pṛthivī bījamiva viśvasṛṣṭau brahma tatkarmāpekṣata iti vaktuṃ dvitīyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2203: itisaṅgatisambhavāt iti śaṅkāsadbhāvācca taduttararūpaṃ sūtramabravīdbādarāyaṇaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2211: nanvadṛśyatvādikaṃ viṣṇorna cet - tarhi vākyasya nirviṣayatayā aprāmāṇyaṃ syāt ityataḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ viśadayati - pṛthivyādīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2212: śrutāvūrṇanābhidṛṣṭāntasya prāthamye 'pi tatra sṛjata ityanena kartṛtvamātrapratīteḥ pūrvapakṣānukūlasyopādānatayā jagatkāraṇatvasyāpratīteḥ taṃ parityajya pṛthivyādītyuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2221: atrāyaṃ vivekaḥ - yadā jaḍaprakṛteḥ pūrvapakṣaviṣayatā tadākṣaraśabdastatparo hetuḥ tatparataḥ parābhidhānaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:2222: tasya niravakāśatve akṣarātparata iti ca vyadhikaraṇe pañcamyau /
GSP33bbdip12u:2234: brahmaśabdo viṣṇāveva mukhya iti tasyaiva sādhako netarasyetyato hetvantaramāha - parata iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2238: evaśabdena hetorniravakāśatvaṃ nātra hetvantaraṃ gaveṣaṇīyamiti sūcayati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2242: itīśaśabdaśravaṇāt rudrasya vā adṛśyatvādiprāptiriti vakṣyamāṇamatrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2243: asmin pakṣer iśaśabdasya viṣṇau sāvakāśatvaśaṅkāyāmanantaraṃ tatparataḥ parābhidhānādityapi yojyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2249: atha dve vāva vidye veditavye parācaivāparā ca /
GSP33bbdip12u:2250: tatra ye vedā yānyaṅgāni yānyupāṅgāni yāni pratyaṅgāni sāparā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2251: atha parā yayā sa harirveditavyo yo 'sāvadṛśyo nirguṇaḥ paraḥ paramātmā ()
GSP33bbdip12u:2254: evaṃ prāptaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamevamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2261: tasya viṣṇordharmastaddharmaḥ tasya bhāvasatattvaṃ teneti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2269: tatra tadvattvaṃ brahmasvarūpamiti viśeṣaṃ vaktum adṛśyatvādayo guṇā yasyeti bahuvrīhitvaṃ ca sūcayituṃ śubhadharmārthakaguṇaśabdaprayogaḥ kapratyayaśca /
GSP33bbdip12u:2271: kutaḥ? atra prakaraṇe 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate'; (muṃ. 1-1-5.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2275: na ca tasya paravidyāviṣayatvoktāvapi kuto viṣṇutvamiti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2279: iti śrutau mokṣasādhanajñānaviṣayatvoktyā viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2286: ityatrāpi viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamucyate iti na hetuviśeṣaṇāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2290: tathā ca parā cāparā ca dve vidye jñātavye /
GSP33bbdip12u:2301: svottamo vyāptaḥ sa hariryayā veditavyaḥ sā ṛgādirūpaiva pareti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2311_2: nirākṛtamapi viśeṣayuktyā nirākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - viśeṣaṇeti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2315: arthāt kintu viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśābhyām iti samuccayārthatvasya spaṣṭatvānna tasyārtha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2316: prakṛtiḥ viriñca ityanena itarā itaraśceti vigrahāśrayeṇetaraśabdārtho 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2323: iti vākye viriñcasya tasmādakṣarājjanyatvarūpabhedakadharmoktyā bhedavyapadeśānnādṛśyatvādiguṇo viriñca iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2345: tattvapradīpe tu - vidasattāyāmiti dhātuvyākhyānāt sarvatra vidyate iti sarvavidityuktam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2353: śrīḥ parā prakṛtiḥ proktā cetanā viṣṇusaṃśrayā //
GSP33bbdip12u:2356: iti skānde tryakṣarābhidhānādakṣarātparataḥ para ityapi viśeṣaṇameva /
GSP33bbdip12u:2359: parataḥ parābhidhānenākṣaraśruteḥ tatra niravakāśatvādityato viśeṣaṇabhedavyapadeśāditi sūtrakhaṇḍasyārthāntaramāha - aparamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2367: proktaṃ vṛddhaistāṃ tat yā viṣṇusaṃśrayā parā uttamā cetanā prakṛtiḥ śrīḥ lakṣmīḥ tāṃ prāhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2368: yatparataḥ paramakṣaramīritaṃ tajjaḍaprakṛteḥ parāchrītattvādakhilaguṇaṃ harimeva prāhuriti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2373: 'aparam'; iti skānde tryakṣarābhidhānāt akṣarāntarātparādasyākṣarasya paratvopapatteriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2374: akṣaratrayābhidhānena akṣarātparataḥ para ityatra sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā anvayo darśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2375: prameyadīpe tu - akṣarācchrītatvātparataḥ paro 'tyuttama iti tadbhāṣyadiśā śrutyartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2381: ityakṣarāṇāmavāntarabhedokteḥ pāṇḍavasyārjunasya svādhamakārtavīryārjunādiva akṣarātparādakṣarāntarādasyākṣarasya paratvopapattiriti sūtrakhaṇḍasyārthāntaramuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2387: nanu 'anyam'; itiśabdaśravaṇādadṛśyatvādiguṇako rudraḥ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkottaratayāpi bhedavyapadeśānnetara iti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - juṣṭamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2397: iti vākye pravṛttaviṣṇvākhyākṣarasyeśaśabditarudrādanyatvavyapadeśādapi nādṛśyatvādiguṇako rudra iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2404: 'yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukmavarṇaṃ kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim'; (muṃ. 3-1-3.) iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2406: yuktyantareṇa viṣṇorevādṛśyatvādiguṇakatvaṃ sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tadupāttaśrutimevodāharati - rūpopanyāseti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2412: atra yadeti vākyasya 'tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'; (muṃ. 3-1-3.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2424: jñānottaravikarmakṛtāśucitvādidoṣarahitaḥ añjanākhyāvidyārahita iti sudhokterajñānarahito vā 'paramaṃ sāmyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2427: tattvodyotaṭīkāyāṃ tu iyaṃ śrutiḥ muktaparatayā vyākhyātā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2431: 'eko nārāyaṇa āsīnna brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2434: tata ete vyajāyanta viśvo hiraṇyagarbho 'gniryamo varuṇarudrendrā iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2435: tasya haitasya paramasya nārāyaṇasya catvāri rūpāṇi śuklaṃ raktaṃ raukmaṃ kṛṣṇamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2439: nanu brahmādīnāmapi rūpasadbhāvātkuto rūpopanyāsenāsya viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - eka iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2444: tathā ca idamasya jagato 'gre pralaye nārāyaṇaḥ 'ekaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2467: mānuṣādau viśeṣeṇa miśrīcakāra yadvā - sa etāni rūpāṇi vyamiśrayat,
GSP33bbdip12u:2478: ato miśrīkaraṇāt tadrūpaṃ tasya viṣṇo rūpam 'etādṛgeva';
GSP33bbdip12u:2495: iti sūrye pratītamapi miśrameveti liṅgasyānyatra niravakāśatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2518: abhito vigataṃ mānaṃ maryādā yasya taṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2531: agnāviṣṇvoḥ sādhāraṇasya vaiśvānaraśabdasya viṣṇāveva prasiddhātmaśabdena viśeṣaṇādvaiśvānaro viṣṇureva // 24 //
GSP33bbdip12u:2540: vaiśvānaraśruteḥ viṣṇau prasiddhyabhāvena tatra niravakāśatvātpūrvoktasarvagatatvasyāpi viṣṇoranyatra niravakāśatvāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2541: tathā ca - yadyapi agnāviṣṇvoḥ pratijñāviṣayayoḥ satoḥ pūrvapakṣasādhakavaiśvānaraśabdo niravakāśatvena prakāreṇottarapakṣasādhakaliṅgasādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2542: śrutiliṅgayorniravakāśatvena sāmye 'pi liṅgācchrutiḥ prabalā tasmādagnireveti prāptam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2543: tathāpi sādhāraṇasyāpi vaiśvānaraśabdasya viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatayā śrutyādisiddhena 'ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram';
GSP33bbdip12u:2553: atra pakṣe sādhāraṇyaṃ prati dharmitvaṃ śabdasyaiva,
GSP33bbdip12u:2567_1: kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ samākhyarūpahetvantareṇa vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvaṃ
GSP33bbdip12u:2581: nanvahamiti viṣṇunā kṛṣṇenokteḥ smṛtyuktavaiśvānarasya viṣṇutve 'pi atroktavaiśvānarasya kuto viṣṇutvamityata āha - samākhyānāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:2584: samākhyāyuktirna sūtroktetyata āha - iti śabda iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2586: tathā ca - itismaryamāṇamityasya itisamākhyāyamānamityarthābhyupagamāditiśabdaḥ samānoktirūpasamākhyālakṣaṇaliṅgajñāpaka iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2591: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānānneti cenna tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśādasambhavātpuruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate / BBs_1,2.26 /
GSP33bbdip12u:2604: vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvamākṣipya samādadhatsūtramupanyasya ākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - śabdādibhya iti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2606: iti bṛhadāraṇyakavākyam 'mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyāṃ vaiśvānarama-ta ājātamagnim /
GSP33bbdip12u:2607: kaviṃ saṃrājamatithiṃ janānāmāsannā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ //'; (ṛ. 6-7-1.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2610: tathā ca ityādirūpaḥ śabdaḥ sautraśabdapadenokta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2634: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ pradhānaliṅgatvādidaṃ pṛthaguktamityabhipretya talliṅgaṃ tatkarmoktyā darśayati pācakatveneti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2636: anena sūtre 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānapadena na kevalaṃ tattaddhṛdayāntaravasthānamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2645: tasmādubhayatra śrutyādisāmyādvaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti niścayo na yujyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2647: iti vicāryavākye vaiśvānaraśabdasamānādhikṛtāgniśabdābhāvādvākyāntaragatāgniśabdasya kathaṃ śaṅkāhetutvamiti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip12u:2650: yadvā - pūrvapakṣe 'pi siddhānta iva samākhyāṃ pradarśayituṃ samākhyārūpeṇa tattadvākyoddhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2651: ayamiti vākye 'yamityuktaḥ ka ityata āha - yo 'yamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2655: tadvyāpāramāha - yeneti idaṃ kimityata āha - yadidamiti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2660: ṛtāyeti vedāntare pāṭhādṛci ṛta iti saptamī tādarthye /
GSP33bbdip12u:2661: tathā ca divaḥ kāraṇabhūtamūrdhānaṃ loke gamanenāratidarśanāt rativiruddhagatisādhanatvādgauṇyā vṛttyā 'aramalamatati gacchati yena puruṣaḥ so 'ratiḥ pādaḥ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2662: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ mukhyayā vṛttyā aratiḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2663: ṛgatāvityasmātkaraṇe atipratyaye niṣpanno 'ratiśabdaḥ pāde mukhya evetyapi kecit /
GSP33bbdip12u:2667: tathā ca - pṛthivyāḥ aratiṃ kāraṇībhūtapādaṃ janānām āṛte samyagjñānāya 'jātam';
GSP33bbdip12u:2678: aṅganetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ prasiddhaṃ ca devā āsan /
GSP33bbdip12u:2684: tattvapradīpe tu - viśvanarastham ṛte vede 'ā samantājjātaṃ';
GSP33bbdip12u:2693: ato 'nekārthatvāddhātūnāṃ viṣṇujanye 'gnau devajanyatvāyogāt janerutpattyarthāyogācca akurvannityuktamiti āṅviśleṣeṇaiva ṭīkā vyākhyeyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2696: iti vākyārthastu - 'tasmāduhaivaṃ vidyadyapi caṇḍālayocchiṣṭaṃ prayacchedātmani haivāsya vaiśvānare hutaṃ syāt'; (chāṃ. 5-24-4.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2700: tadā taddattamucchiṣṭaṃ caṇḍālāntaryāmiṇi vaiśvānare hutaṃ syānna pāpakaraṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2706: dakṣiṇāgniranvāhārya odano 'tra pacyata iti vyutpatti sambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2715: anenāgnau hūyamānadravyasyāgniḥ pācaka iti siddhamiti pācakatvākhyaliṅgamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2724: na, 'atha hemamātmānamaṇoraṇīyāṃsaṃ parataḥ paraṃ viśvaṃ harimupāsīteti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2725: sarvanāmā sarvakarmā sarvaliṅgaḥ sarvaguṇaḥ sarvakāmaḥ sarvadharmaḥ sarvarūpa iti'; /
GSP33bbdip12u:2735: kuto 'gnyādināmakarmaṇāṃ viṣṇāveva sāvakāśatvaṃ jñāyata ityatastatra hetusamarpakaṃ 'tathādṛṣṭyupadeśāt';
GSP33bbdip12u:2754: etadicchayaiva sarvaṃ bhavatīti sarvakāmaḥ pūrṇakāma ityupāsīta /
GSP33bbdip12u:2757: sarvatra rūpamasya iti vā sarvaṃ jagadasya rūpaṃ pratimeti vā sarvarūpa ityupāsīta /
GSP33bbdip12u:2760: 'sa ya etamevamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ harimārādaramupāste tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu deveṣu sarveṣu vedeṣu kāmacāro bhavati';
GSP33bbdip12u:2764: 'saḥ'; prasiddhaḥ yo 'dhikārī etamātmānam aṇoraṇīyāṃsaṃ parataḥparameva viśvaṃ harimeva,
GSP33bbdip12u:2767: alaṃ samyagupāste tasyaivamavyāpte vyāptarūpopāsakasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu 'bhūteṣu';
GSP33bbdip12u:2768: prāṇiṣu sarveṣu lokeṣu sthiteṣu bhūteṣviti vā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2770: vedeṣu yatheṣṭasañcāraḥ kāmasañcaraṇasarvapūjyatvasarvajñatvādiḥ syāt ityarthaḥ tattvapradīpe 'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2784: abrahmāṇaḥ pare sarve brahmātmā viṣṇureva hi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2788_0: evamanyaśrutiliṅgadīnāṃ viṣṇau sāvakāśatvopapādakatayā tathetyaṃśaṃ vyākhyāya ātmaśabdāderanyatra
GSP33bbdip12u:2789: yojanātu - ityādinā pramāṇena viṣṇoranyeṣām ātmatvabrahmatvāsambhavokteḥ ata eva ātmaśabdāderanyatrāsambhavāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2791: kintu prakaraṇabalācca vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatītyāha - anāttatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2794: tathācetthaṃ yojanā - 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:2800: anena sūtre ārambhāditi padamadhyāhṛtya tenāpiśabdaḥ saṃyojyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2805: kintu pradhānenaiveti jñāpanāya viṣṇureva vaiśvānara iti punaruktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2814: chāndogye hi 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip12u:2815: iti militvā mīmāṃsamānaiḥ pratyabdayajñakṛttvanimittānmahāśālasaṃjñaiḥ pañcabhirmahāmunibhiḥ uddālakoddiṣṭaistadyuktaiḥ paripṛṣṭo rājāśvapatirvaiśvānaramupadideśa /
GSP33bbdip12u:2824: ityādinā yaḥ puruṣākhyo viṣṇubhihitastadvidhamevātra 'mūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpaḥ prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmā'; (chāṃ. 5-18-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2836: ityādikaṃ dvitīyādipadena 'sandoho bahulo vastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau'; (chāṃ. 5-18-2.)
GSP33bbdip12u:2841: ityādinā śabdena yaḥ puruṣākhyo viṣṇuḥ yadvidho dyubhvādijanakaśīrṣādimānabhihitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2843: ityādinā vākyenainaṃ vaiśvānaramadhīyate chandogāḥ tasmātpuruṣasūktasamākhyayāpi vaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2848: nanu puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatve bhavettatsamākhyayā etadvidyāyā viṣṇuparatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip12u:2854: ātmaśabdasmṛtisamākhyāprakaraṇasamuccayasyeva prakaraṇaśrutisamuccayasyāpi apipadenaiva siddhatvānna tatropakṣīṇaścaśabda iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33bbdip12u:2859: tathaiva me mano nityaṃ bhūyādviṣṇuparāyaṇam // iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2861: kiṃ tadvedādītyataśśruteḥ sākṣātpratijñātārthāsādhakatvātpratijñākramamatikramya sākṣātpratijñātārthasādhakatvādādau purāṇavākyaṃ paṭhati - tathā ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2862: sūtre puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti yathoktaṃ tathā brāhme coktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2870: iti śabdānvayaḥ siddhārthasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvādanena brāhmavacanena vivakṣitārtho jñāyate //
GSP33bbdip12u:2874: iti eṣa hyaivācintyaḥ paraḥ paramo harirādiranādirananto 'nantaśīrṣo 'nantākṣo 'nantabāhuranantaguṇo 'nantarūpa iti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2876: pratijñātāṃ śrutiṃ darśayituṃ prathamameva tatsthānamāha - caturvedaśikhāyāṃ ceti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2881: ityukto harireva nānya ityetatsūktaṃ viṣṇuparatayā vyākhyātīti prakṛtasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:2905: na tathā sarvavedāśca vedāṅgāni ca nārada // ityādi /
GSP33bbdip12u:2907_2: sākṣātpratijñātārthasādhakaṃ smṛtivākyaṃ tatsthānanirdeśapūrvakaṃ paṭhati - bṛhatsaṃhitāyāṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip12u:2927: yadyapi nātra chāndogye vedābheda ucyate iti na tadgatirvaktavyā /
GSP33bbdip12u:2935: tathā ca yasmādyasmāt hareraṅgāt yadyat lokavedādikaṃ jāyate,
GSP33bbdip12u:2938: tasya lokāderyannāma vācakaśabdaḥ tena mukhyavācyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2945: ata eva tadabhinnatvena pratīyate ca sāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP33bbdip12u:2961: viśvāni rūpāṇi viṣayatvena yasyeti vigrahāśrayeṇa sarvarūpātidarśanāt cakṣurviśvarūpākhyam /
GSP33bbdip12u:2962: evaṃ viṣṇoḥ prāṇo nṛsiṃhākhyo vāyvādiprāṇaśakyaṃ yanna bhavati tasya pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthagvilakṣaṇo mārgo yasya sa cāsāvātmā ceti,
GSP33bbdip12u:2966: agnyādiśruteḥ gārhapatyādyaṅgavatvādiliṅgācca pācakatvenāntaḥpratiṣṭhānācca vaiśvānaro viṣṇureveti niścayo na yujyata iti cet - na,
GSP33bbdip12u:2981: kintu yataḥ puruṣasūkte puruṣo yadvidho 'bhihitaḥ tadvidhamevainaṃ viṣṇuṃ 'mūrdhaiva';
GSP33bbdip12u:2983: ataḥ śrutisamākhyānādapi caśabdaḥ puruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ bahupramāṇasiddhamiti dyotayatīti sūtravṛttirdarśitā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip12u:2987: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.27 /
GSP33bbdip12u:2989: agnivaiśvānarādiśabdastejasi bhūte agnidevatāyāṃ ca prasiddho 'pyataḥ pūrvoktahetuta evātra na sā taccābhidhīyate // 27 //
GSP33bbdip12u:2991: nanu vaiśvānaraśabdasya devatābhūtayoḥ prasiddhatvādatrāpyasau tatparaḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasyati - ata eveti //
GSP33bbdip12u:2992: atra caśabdasya samuccayārthatvaṃ yadyapi tathāpītyarthatvaṃ cāśritya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - agnīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:3019: nāgnyādayaḥ śabdā agnyādivācakāstathāpi sākṣādevānanyayogena brahmavācakaiśśabdaiḥ vyavahārārthamanabhijñānācca anyatra vyavaharantītyabhyupagame 'virodhaṃ jaiminirvakti /
GSP33bbdip12u:3021: nanu loke vede ca agnyādipadānārm iśādanyatra vyavahāraprasiddhidarśanāt tasya ca kāraṇāntarābhāvāttadanyathānupapattyānyeṣāṃ vāṭcvamaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33bbdip12u:3022: anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - sākṣāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:3025: agniśabda eva ādiryeṣāṃ te 'gnyādaya iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:3036: caśabdo na kevalaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ kintvanabhijñānācceti samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip12u:3037: 'anyatra'; agnyādiṣu tān tatra vyavaharanti jñānino 'jñāninaśceti krameṇa śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:3048_0: kutaḥ? yato vācyārthadhīvyavahitaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ vinā sākṣānmukhyavṛttyāpi brahmavācakānagnyādiśabdān
GSP33bbdip12u:3048_3: prasiddhivilopābhāvaṃ vaktyasya iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati //
GSP33bbdip12u:3055: nanu jaiminyādimatānāṃ bhagavanmatāvirodhitve jaiminyādigrahaṇavaiyarthyāt tadvirodhitve vā kathaṃ viruddharāddhāntena parihāra ityata āha - vyāseti //
GSP33bbdip12u:3060: svasvamatyā viviktāni tāni matāni idaṃ madīyaṃ idaṃ madīyaṃ ityūrīkṛtyānye vyavaharanti /
GSP33bbdip12u:3061: yathā gṛhanagarādibhirākāśapradeśānavacchidyāyaṃ madīyaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ madīyaḥ pradeśa iti janāḥ vyavaharantīti /
GSP33bbdip12u:3063: tathā ca jaiminyādimatānāṃ vyāsamatena parasparaṃ cāvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:3084: anenāpi - tattatsūktādau brahmaṇa eva pratipādyatve 'pi agnivāyvādīnāmapratipādyatve 'pi avirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip12u:3085: agnyādisūktaniyamaḥ idamagnisūktam idaṃ vāyusūktam iti sūktaniyamaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:3087: kathaṃ? tairagnyādisūktādibhistasya brahmaṇastasyāmupāstau kṛtāyāṃ tatrāgnyādiṣveva tasya brahmaṇaḥ 'abhi';
GSP33bbdip12u:3088: svecchayābhivyaktiniyamāttadabhiprāyeṇa tatprasiddherupapatterityevaṃ vaidikāgnyādisūktādiprasiddhyavirodhamāśmarathyācāryo vaktīti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati //
GSP33bbdip12u:3113: jaiminimatasya pūrvamupanyastatvātkimarthaṃ punarvacanamiti mandāśaṅkānirāsāya ubhayānvayīti śabdaparāmṛṣṭapūrvoktānuvādena viṣayabhedaṃ darśayan sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sākṣāditi //
GSP33bbdip12u:3124: nanvagnyādiṣu bhagavadupāstau agnyādiprāptirbhavatītyetatkuta ityataḥ sūtrasūcitāṃ śrutimudāharati - tamiti //
GSP33bbdip12u:3125: 'taṃ'; paramātmānaṃ yena yena prakāreṇa upāsate adhikāriṇaḥ tena prakāreṇa tadeva rūpaṃ 'bhavati';
GSP33bbdip12u:3132: anena yato 'gnyādisūktādiṣu mukhyataḥ parabrahmaṇa eva pratipādyatve 'pyavirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:3150: yadyapi ṛgbhāṣye - pṛthagrūpāṇi viṣṇostu devātāntaragāṇi tu /
GSP33bbdip12u:3160: na hyanyopāsako 'nyaṃ prāpnuta iti yujyata ityata āha -
GSP33bbdip12u:3170: ityādau tadanabhyupagamācceti bhāvenāśaṅkya tatparihāratayā sūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - na hīti //
GSP33bbdip12u:3181: tattvapradīpe tu - na kevalamekatraivāmananti paṭhanti vājasaneyāḥ,
GSP33bbdip12u:3212: agnyādau āmananti śrutayo 'ta iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
